subject: Re: Hi, New Member from UK
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I find that i miss a lot in real-time when doing a session live.  
That's why it's always good to record and review what you may have  
missed.  I would love to hear your recordings and see what you've 
been getting.  And you are using a mobile phone....that's 
interesting.  That continues to prove that they will use anything we 
have to communicate.

Good Job and continued success,
-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "tonyandsue13" <tonyandsue13@...> 
wrote:
>
> Within the last week I came across the concept of the ghost box

scan,

either
